question: Which of the following statements is correct about the term “Data Exclusivity”, sometimes seen in news?
option1: It is a new telecommunication policy which promotes free data within the norms of the Discriminatory Tariff Regulations
option2: It is a pharmaceutical policy which protects the patented products of pharmaceutical companies
option3: It is a new security measure to protect citizens biometric data linked to Aadhaar
option4: It is a new open policy by WIPO for protecting digital assets & sensitive data leakage
answer: It is a pharmaceutical policy which protects the patented products of pharmaceutical companies
explanation: Data exclusivity prevents drug regulators from referring the data submitted by the drug originator company to be used for manufacturing Biosimilars of the same.
